name: Microsoft Dark
description:
A dark version of most of microsoft documentation websites and other microsoft domain.

This was intended for MSDN only, but I got tired of being blinded when opening other microsoft resources so I tried to cover most microsoft reference websites.
additional_info:
There is no screenshot for now because i'm still updating it and discovering all the places where microsoft used different classes for no reason.

Some colors are hard-coded inline in a span which makes me unable to modify it even when using !important.

Or sometimes microsoft used an image with a white background which makes me unable to modify.

I updated it a little, but microsoft added the option for a dark theme on a few of the website targeted by this making it redundant.
